summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Paul Morris regarding updates on ACATs (Automated Customer Account Transfers) related to financial matters at Deutsche Bank. Amanda is seeking information to complete her end-of-day update for Paul, who is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is providing an update on ACATs to Paul Morris and is requesting additional information to finalize her report.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email and is requesting updates on the ACATs from Amanda Kirby.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is working on updates related to ACATs for Deutsche Bank.
Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank and is involved in the correspondence.
The document contains internal updates and requests for information.
Certain items in the email are marked with question marks indicating missing information.
